name: rwa2025-mplastic21
description: Web aplikacija za evidenciju odgledanih TV serija

scripts.pripremi: test -d node_modules/express && test -d node_modules/express-session && test -d node_modules/cors && test -d node_modules/sqlite3 || (npm install --no-package-lock --ignore-scripts --silent 2>/dev/null || (mkdir -p node_modules && ln -sf /usr/lib/node_modules/express node_modules/express && ln -sf /usr/lib/node_modules/express-session node_modules/express-session && ln -sf /usr/lib/node_modules/cors node_modules/cors && ln -sf /usr/lib/node_modules/sqlite3 node_modules/sqlite3))
scripts.start-spider: npm run pripremi && (test -f build/server.js || (npm run compile && npm run copy-files)) && npm run server
scripts.start-local: npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run copy-files && npm run server
scripts.debug: npm run compile && npm run copy-files && node --enable-source-maps --inspect-brk=9229 build/server.js

author: Marin Plastic
